languages.text: [Миряне боятся мрачного взгляда ткачей. Я буду молчать. Долго. Его воля рухнет]

traits.locale_text: [Миряне боятся мрачного взгляда ткачей. Буду просто молчать. Долго. Чтобы сломать его волю]

languages.text: [The laypeople fear the grim gaze of the spinners. I will stay silent and wait. His resolve is bound to crumble]
languages.original_text: [Миряне боятся мрачного взгляда ткачей. Я буду молчать. Долго. Его воля рухнет]

traits.locale_text: [The laypeople fear the grim gaze of the weavers. I will be silent for a long time. His will is bound to crumble.]
[The laypeople fear the grim gaze of the weavers. I will be silent for a long time. His will is bound to crumble.]
[The laypeople fear the grim gaze of the weavers. I shall stay silent for a long time. His will is bound to crumble.]
[The laypeople fear the grim gaze of the weavers. I shall stay silent for a long time. His will is bound to crumble.]
[The laypeople fear the grim gaze of the spinners. I will stay silent and wait. His resolve is bound to crumble]
[The laypeople fear the grim gaze of the spinners. I will stay silent and wait. His resolve is bound to crumble]

languages.text: [Die Laien fürchten den grimmigen Blick der Spinner. Ich werde schweigen und warten. Seine Entschlossenheit wird irgendwann bröckeln.]
languages.original_text: [The laypeople fear the grim gaze of the spinners. I will stay silent and wait. His resolve is bound to crumble]

traits.locale_text: [Die Laien fürchten den grimmigen Blick der Weber. Ich werde schweigen und warten. Seine Entschlossenheit wird irgendwann bröckeln.]
[Die Laien fürchten den grimmigen Blick der Weber. Ich werde schweigen und warten. Seine Entschlossenheit wird irgendwann bröckeln.]

languages.text: [Los laicos temen la mirada de los tejedores. Guardaré silencio y esperaré. Su determinación cederá.]
languages.original_text: [The laypeople fear the grim gaze of the spinners. I will stay silent and wait. His resolve is bound to crumble]

traits.locale_text: [Los laicos temen la mirada de los tejedores. Guardaré silencio y esperaré. Su determinación cederá.]

languages.text: [平民たちは紡績工の厳しい視線を恐れている。私は黙ったままで待つ。彼の決意は崩れることだろう]
languages.original_text: [The laypeople fear the grim gaze of the spinners. I will stay silent and wait. His resolve is bound to crumble]

traits.locale_text: [平民たちは織り手の厳しい視線を恐れている。私は黙ったままで待つ。彼の決意は崩れることだろう]

languages.text: [乌合之众畏惧织网者严厉的目光。我打算保持沉默，耐心等待，因为他的决心必将崩溃]
languages.original_text: [The laypeople fear the grim gaze of the spinners. I will stay silent and wait. His resolve is bound to crumble]

traits.locale_text: [乌合之众畏惧织网者严厉的目光。我打算保持沉默，耐心等待，因为他的决心必将崩溃]

languages.text: [Les profanes craignent le regard sinistre des tisseurs. Je vais attendre en silence. Sa détermination est vouée à s'effondrer.]
languages.original_text: [The laypeople fear the grim gaze of the spinners. I will stay silent and wait. His resolve is bound to crumble]

traits.locale_text: [Les profanes craignent le regard sinistre des tisseurs. Je vais attendre en silence. Sa détermination est vouée à s'effondrer.]

languages.text: [Avam tabakası, dokurların gaddar bakışlarından korkar. Sesimi çıkarmadan bekleyeceğim. Kararlılığını kaybedeceği muhakkak]
languages.original_text: [The laypeople fear the grim gaze of the spinners. I will stay silent and wait. His resolve is bound to crumble]
